subject: Running
New York City Marathon
Records and Achievements
Elderly
Age, Chronological
lead_paragraph: Upon completing the New York City Marathon on Sunday, Jon Mendes would become the ninth-oldest finisher in the race’s history, but he has a bigger goal for 2014.
snippet: Upon completing the New York City Marathon on Sunday, Jon Mendes would become the ninth-oldest finisher in the race’s history, but he has a bigger goal for 2014.
